attributes.action: Provide mobile clinics to housebound/bedbound people.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is no provision for health services such as proper dental treatment, routine screening such as smear tests, mammograms, minor surgery for people who cannot get out of bed or the house due to severe and chronic illness and disability. Please sign for a mobile unit to offer these essential services to these people.
